<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Eclipse](/Equipment.aspx?ID=503)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 72

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) striking [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) [starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)_ has an ornate central grip that depicts a silver dragon, the neck, wings, and tail of which wrap over and around the handle in knots to support the weapon’s four cold iron blades. While the handle is polished to a mirrorlike shine, the blades of _Eclipse_ are a flat black and entirely unreflective. _Eclipse_ is also the portal key required to activate Dreamgate at Alseta’s Ring.

 Whenever you score a critical hit with _Eclipse_, the target creature’s eyes are plunged into darkness; if that creature doesn’t have [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), it is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 round.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** _Eclipse’s_ blades glow like starlit night sky, causing it to shed light as a torch until you deactivate it as a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** three times per day; **Trigger** You attempt a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63), but you haven’t rolled yet;  **Effect** You absorb light, gaining a +2 status bonus to the Stealth check.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
